abstract: We describe a portable an autonomous instrument allowing : on one hand, to measure and record, in less than 1 minute, the temperature of 32 samples, and on the other hand, to follow during more than 24 hours tiny temperature variations, with a precision as good as 0.01°C. Then, the recorded data can be transferred on a punch-tape with a view to treat them by a computer. It as been tested successfully in a bra.
meta: November 2019Journal de Biophysique et Medecine Nucleaire 7,1(1983):37
Project: Détection des cancers du sein
